resources.string: This app has two kinds of puzzle games.
Click the piece besides the blank to move the image piece to the blank position
Click two pieces to swip the two pieces
You can select the initial level in the home page. Every time you finish the level, you can come to the next level.
When you start the game, there is a steps counter to count the number of steps you have used.
There is a time limit for each level. If you did not finish the game within the time limit, you cannot continue the game. You can choose either restart or give up.
You can choose the default image, or choose image from the phone gallery, or take a picture through the camera.
In the game, you can show the original image. Also, you can reset the game. You can also change the image and level.
You can change between the two types of game.
